result.arabic_text: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَسۡتَ مُرۡسَلٗاۚ قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ وَمَنۡ عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
result.translation: Mucammadak ﷺ : atu Yalli ruube farmoyta hinnito iyyen, Nabiyow : anu farmoyta kinniyooh numma aceemih yoo kee sin fanal sumaaqah Yalli yoo xiqah, yahuud kee nasaarak yeemene maray kitab ixxiga Íe sumaaqah yoo xiqah keenik ixxic.
